sections.heading: MAID Track One: Assessment of Patient Eligibility and Procedural Safeguards
sections.summary:
Request for MAID must be made in writing. Awritten requestmust be signed by one independent witness, and it must be made after the patient is informed that
they have a “grievous and irremediable medication condition” (Clinician Aid A)Two independent Clinicians must provide an assessment and confirm that all of the eligibility requirements are metThe patient must be informed that they can withdraw their request at any time, in any manner
